name: Elderfact (Zera, pillowrd)
description:
Game description

Guided by the village's elder, a young wizard takes to the tower of curses to retrieve an ancient artifact to save the village.

Use the three elements: Fire, teleportation, and resurrection to clear challenging puzzles and defeat the evils of the tower.

Controls
  • Gameplay:
    • WASD or arrow keys to move.
    • R to restart the current room.
    • Space to forward dialogue and menus.
    • 1, 2, 3 to choose an element.
    • Scrollwheel to switch element.
    • Left mouse button to select a target.
    • Right mouse button to cancel selection.
  • Extra:
    • Control + R to restart the game.
    • Esc to close the game.
    • F11 to toggle fullscreen.
Credits

Programming: Zera

Visuals: Pillowbyte

SFX: Beep Yeah!, Harvey656 and Labbed

Music: Chippy01302 and Tallbeard Studios

Free asset pack

Thanks to the phenomenal talent of Pillowbyte, Elderfact got a complete asset overhaul for its finished release. We have decided to release these assets as a complete pack, for free, so you can start making your own games today!
We would love to see your creations, so make sure to link them in the comments of the asset pack!

> Asset pack link

With that said, we hope you enjoy the game as well as the assets!
Thank you ^^
